title: Lunarify - React
description: This is a React app which utilizes Spotify API to show user's top listened-to artists and albums.

title: Lunarify - React Native
description: This is a React Native version of my Lunarify web app for Android and iOS.

title: Lunarstars
description: This is a simple website which generates random pixel art images of stars and planets which you can use for your TTRPG campaign or anything else you want.

title: WIP: Minos
description: ANV Production's project in which I am responsible for coding for Arduino and Raspberry Pi devices using C++ and Python. We are developing hardware and software for an IRL game based on Twine.

title: AMO
description: An Unreal Engine 5 project I worked on as a developer while working at Nyx VX. Click on the title or picture to go to steam page.

title: WIP: Time Finder
description: DiscordJS bot which allows you to create polls to choose the best time for you and your discord server friends. React frontend, NodeJS backend, MongoDB and DiscordJS.

title: Lunarroller
description: This is the first website I ever made. It is written in Html, CSS and Javascript only.
